summary: In 1997, the Belgian public was in shock when judge Koen A. was convicted for the S&M relationship with his wife. Although their life was destroyed by the verdict, Koen and his wife Magda ... See full summary »
cast: Gene Bervoets|Veerle Dobbelaere|Axel Daeseleire|Sofia Ferri|Carry Goossens|Günther Lesage|Michael Pas|Barbara Sarafian|Sean Talo|Dirk van Dijck|Koen van Impe|Bruno Vanden Broecke|Tjorven Vannieuwenhuyse|Marie Vinck|Tom Waes
title: SM-rechter
